articles.author: Madeline Holcombe, CNN
articles.title: Expert hopes the rise in Covid-19 vaccinations means the US is waking up to the dangers of the Delta variant - CNN
articles.description: The Delta variant is wreaking havoc through much of the United States, but the "silver lining" is that more Americans appear to be at the tipping point of understanding the importance of Covid-19 vaccinations, one expert said.

articles.title: Meggitt agrees £6.3bn takeover by Parker Hannifin - Financial Times
articles.description: Company’s shares surge to record high after latest move from an American buyer targeting a British group
articles.content:
UK aerospace and defence company Meggitt is to be taken over by US rival Parker Hannifin in a £7.1bn deal that marks the latest approach for a UK listed company by an overseas buyer.

articles.title: Some vaccinated Americans have lost their patience with those refusing the shot as Covid-19 cases surge and mandates - Flipboard
